greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers, inverse permutation of A094870.
link: Carl R. White, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9660
Peter Hegarty, Permutations avoiding arithmetic patterns, The Electronic Journal of Combinatorics, 11 (2004), #R39.
maple: A:=proc(n) option remember; local t, S, i; S:={$1..300} minus {seq(A(i),i=1..n-1)}; t:=min(S[]); i:=1; while i<floor((n+1)/2) do if t-A(n-i)=A(n-i)-A(n-2*i) then S:=S minus {t}; t:=min(S[]); i:=1 else i:=i+1 fi od; t end: A(1):=1: L:=[seq(A(n),n=1..200)]: a:=n-> if member(n,L,'p') then p else 0 fi: seq(a(n),n=1..194);
results.author: Alec Mihailovs (alec(AT)mihailovs.com), Jul 05 2004
